description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented applications (Java, Spring Boot, Micronaut)

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "process_uptime" WHERE  "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/
SELECT last("value") FROM "process_start_time" WHERE  "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'heap'  and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("area" = 'heap'  and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'  and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'  and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'heap'  and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_committed" WHERE ("area" = 'heap' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("area" = 'heap' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'  and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_committed" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'   and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'  and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE  "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_committed" WHERE    "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE   "servicename" = 'dhruva'  and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'heap'   and "id" = 'G1\\ Old\\ Gen' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'heap'   and "id" = 'G1\\ Eden\\ Space' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'heap'   and "id" = 'G1\\ Survivor\\ Space' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT distinct("id") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap' ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "servicename"

SELECT "value" FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'  and "id" = 'Metaspace' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "value" FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'  and "id" = 'Compressed\\ Class\\ Space' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "value" FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'  and "id" = 'Code\\ Cache' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "value" FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap'  and "id" = 'CodeHeap\\ \'non-nmethods\'' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT ("value") FROM "process_cpu_usage" WHERE "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  and $timeFilter
SELECT ("value") FROM "system_cpu_usage" WHERE "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  and  $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "process_cpu_usage" WHERE  "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  and  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(previous)
SELECT("value") FROM "system_load_average_1m" WHERE "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  and $timeFilter
SELECT("value") FROM "system_cpu_count" WHERE   "servicename" = 'dhruva'  and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ and $timeFilter
SELECT("value") FROM "jvm_threads_live" WHERE "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  and $timeFilter
SELECT("value") FROM "jvm_threads_daemon" WHERE "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/  and $timeFilter
SELECT("value") FROM "jvm_threads_peak" WHERE "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ and $timeFilter
SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_threads_states" WHERE  ("state" = 'blocked' AND "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) and $timeFilter
SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_threads_states" WHERE  ("state" = 'new' AND "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) and $timeFilter
SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_threads_states" WHERE ("state" = 'waiting' and "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_threads_states" WHERE  ("state" = 'runnable' AND "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) and $timeFilter
SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_threads_states" WHERE  ("state" = 'terminated' AND "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) and $timeFilter
SELECT ("value") FROM "jvm_threads_states" WHERE  ("state" = 'timed-waiting' AND "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ ) and $timeFilter

SELECT mean("count") FROM "jvm_gc_pause" WHERE "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ and "instancename"=~ /$instance/ and $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "action" , "cause" fill(0)
SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(mean("duration") , 1s)FROM "jvm.gc.summary" WHERE "servicename" = 'dhruva' and "environment" =~ /$environment/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "action", "cause"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_gc_memory_allocated" WHERE ("servicename" = 'dhruva') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "jvm_gc_memory_promoted" WHERE ("servicename" = 'dhruva') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: show tag values from "jvm_memory_used" with key="environment" where "servicename" = 'dhruva'
list.label: Environment Name
list.name: environment
list.query: show tag values from "jvm_memory_used" with key="environment" where "servicename" = 'dhruva'

list.definition: SHOW TAG values from "jvm_memory_used" with key = "instancename" where "environment" =~ /$environment/ and time >= now()
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG values from "jvm_memory_used" with key = "instancename" where "environment" =~ /$environment/ and time >= now()

title: Dhruva Application JVM Metrics
